ad_text: A&M Carriers INC Sponsored A&M CARRIERS FLAT RENTAL PROGRAM GIVES TRUCKERS THE BEST OF BOTH WORLDS: - UP FRONT CLARITY on rates and terms - FULL TEAM LOGISTICS SUPPORT – the same quality that company drivers enjoy! If you’ve been around the trucking game for a long, chances are you can spot a cherry-picked opportunity from a mile away. You know what I’m talking about: those season-long contracts to haul the same loads week after week, on primo routes, with performance bonuses galore. You know, the kind of repeat hauls that make this a SUPER-PROFITABLE business when you’re in the right place at the right time. Yeah, those are the kind of gigs that every driver wants. But they generally come with a “Catch-22” clause, and that is specific equipment requirements. You know, like it’s an ice cream route that pays HUGE returns but ONLY if you have a reefer. Or maybe it’s a steel coil haul but ONLY if you have a flatbed with ties. Whatever the load, it always seems to require the exact type of truck or trailer you DON’T have! But what if there was a better way? You know, what if you could just “snap your fingers” and quickly get the exact equipment you need? And better yet, what if you could get that equipment quickly without the need to fill out all of the red tape, application forms, permit filings, and a ton of other headaches and hassles? Well, now you can, thanks to the A&M Carriers FLAT RATE Truck Rental Plan. - ONE FLAT PAYMENT covers EVERYTHING: Truck Rent, Miles, Insurance, ELD, IPAD, IFTA, Prepass, Dash Camera, and more – all you pay for is fuel. - MAINTENANCE & SERVICE is INCLUDED. We cover maintenance and provide roadside assistance, plus we provide 24/7 access to our top-notch logistics team to get you where you’re going. ISN’T FLAT-RATE TRUCK RENTAL EXPENSIVE? Sure, renting a truck and/or trailer is NOT cheap. It’s always better to own, but what if you don’t have the capital or the credit to own at this time? And what if you have a guaranteed offer of work, but you have to be ready to roll NOW? Renting can be a great answer because it gets you on the road QUICKLY without having to calculate every single expense or file a ton of paperwork and do 101 things before you ever rack up mile #1. It’s fast, it’s easy, and it makes sense for eager beaver deal makers who are finally ready to earn the BIG BUCKS! GET THE FACTS AND COMPARE FOR YOURSELF: - Leases as short as 6 months - TRUCK: Flat rate: $1,600 per week. �Includes Truck Rent, Miles, Insurance (Physical, Cargo, Occupational Accident, ELD, IPAD, IFTA, Prepass, Dash Camera) - TRAILER�RGN Flat Rate: $525/week�Reefer Flat Rate: $380/week�Includes Trailer Rent, Physical Insurance JUST AS IMPORTANT: WHAT YOU DON’T GET. When you rent a truck and/or trailer from A&M Carriers, you WON’T have to mess with the paperwork and nit-picking expenses of maintenance, passes, documentation, repairs, taxes, state permits, mile logging, etc., etc., etc. Leave all of THOSE headaches to our logistics team. (They actually LIKE doing that stuff…!) What’s more, when you rent from A&M Carriers you’ll be dealing with a #1 RGN company smack-dab in the middle of the Midwest – where so many of the BIG loads originate. We specialize in oversized and overweight loads, and we offer ALL THE WORK YOU WANT with: - Loads with increased earning potential - Transparency and predictability of rental and associated costs - Maintenance services and roadside assistance - Our 2 Shops in Illinois where you get Priority repairs and maintenance - Partner service locations across the United States, Canada, and Mexico - 24/7 team support dispatchers, fleet managers, and logbook services - Quick access to rental trucks - Information on the best-priced Fueling locations Perhaps the TOP THREE REASONS to consider renting a truck from A&M Carriers are these: a. BEING YOUR OWN BOSS and getting the “sweet” contracts. b. NO RED-TAPE OR HEADACHES because “we sweat the small stuff” for you. c. PREDICTABILITY. No worries about unexpected repairs or expenses; it's smooth sailing all the way because we’ve got you covered! TAKE CHARGE OF YOUR CAREER and step out as a real trucking entrepreneur. Renting a truck or trailer from A&M Carriers can be your key to real career freedom and success. So let's get on a call to discuss the details of Flat Rate Truck Renting today! Just tap the button below to fill out the quick form and we will get back to you ASAP. At A&M, we’re working to make your trucking career a long-haul success! FB.ME UP FRONT CLARITY on rates and terms Apply now

A&M Carriers INC Sponsored READY TO MAKE SOME SERIOUS CASH? COMPANY DRIVERS FOR A&M EARN SOLO: 65 CPM & UP * TEAM: 75 CPM & UP. OPEN DECK DRIVERS GET 25% & UP FROM THE GROSS! Okay, now THIS is where it starts to get seriously interesting. Your talent as a safe and steady long haul truck driver put you in high demand. It’s what you’ve worked for your entire life! In this seller’s market, you should be able to cherry-pick exactly what you want: the best hauls, the best equipment, the best routes, and more… WHAT’S THAT YOU SAY? You’re NOT ENJOYING those benefits currently? If you’re NOT 100% PLEASED with what you’re hauling, where you’re hauling it, who you’re hauling it for and when you’re hauling it – this short story might be worth a quick read. IT’S NO SECRET that there’s a LOT of money to be made right now. It’s the busy season, to be sure, so there’s lots of “quick cash” to be made. But is “quick cash” what you’re really after? Sometimes it can help to do a “reality check” before letting those dazzling big numbers seduce you. Taking quick-shot jobs can be lucrative, but at what cost to your family – your health – your job satisfaction level? What if you could enjoy a fixed schedule with consistent loads & equipment and consistently high pay week in and week out? Would that help you settle a LOT of your personal issues all in one…? We’re A&M Carriers, and we need company drivers. We only hire excellent safe drivers with good track records, and if that sounds like you – we’ve got a rock-solid offer for you: • 65 CPM & UP (SOLO) • 75 CPM & UP (TEAM) • Open deck drivers get 25% & UP from the gross. And because we only hire “the best of the best” drivers we know you will only want to drive the “best of the best” equipment: • 2020/2022 Trucks and Trailers. We keep our trucks in pristine condition and fully maintained as we have our own repairs shop. As even MORE reward of driving for a top-tier company you’ll enjoy: • 24/7 support • Safe driving cash reward • Referral bonuses But the absolute BEST reason to become a company driver for A&M Carriers is the support. Many companies claim it, but we have an award-winning dispatch and data team that is second to none. Our live 24/7 driver support agents will handle everything for you and treat you like the professional you are. In fact, our dispatch and data team are the secret to our growth and to our success. Every pallet on every trailer we haul is electronically “synced” to our data center, so we’re able to provide our clients with real-time status reports. And it all happens “behind the scenes” so you as the driver just relax and enjoy the ride. Our skilled drivers and our technology advancements give our giant shipping clients the reliability they require. And probably one of the best reasons to become a company driver for A&M is consistency. If you’re a driver who hates “surprises”, this could be the greatest career improvement you’ve ever been offered. Our top drivers get to choose the routes they like and the days they like to drive them. Having a steady routine Is a luxury that company drivers seem to enjoy most of all. So who is A&M Carriers, and why should you consider driving for us? Ask around, and you’ll discover that we’re one of America’s hottest and fastest growing carriers. We have earned the trust and loyalty of a number of top shippers in America including Walmart, Amazon, TQL, Robinson and others. In fact, we started A&M Carriers in 2016 with just 2 trucks. We hit 18 in 2018, 74 in 2020, and we are now at 102 trucks and trailers. ALL of this remarkable growth is due to our winning combination of: Top drivers * Top technology * Top customer service If you’re ready to become a part of our on-going success story, we’d like to talk. Just tap the button below to fill out a quick form and we’ll schedule you for a call with one of our founders. It’s the only way to discover what we’re all about and have all of your most detailed questions answered. FB.ME Tap here to speak to us Tap here to fill out the quick form Apply now

A&M Carriers INC Sponsored IT’S TIME FOR SUMMERTIME FUN – AND HUGE CASH REWARDS FOR EXPERIENCED REEFER & DRY VAN HAULERS: * UP TO $12K PER WEEK * UP TO $18K FOR TEAMS It’s the good old summertime once again, and the living is easy – especially if you’re an owner-operator that loves to haul Reefer & Dry van. As you know, summertime is the busiest season of all for truckers – and this summer can be your MOST PROFITABLE EVER! If you have a truck and you’re an experienced Reefer & Dry Van hauler, this is the time to REALLY rake in the cash: * Up to $12K per week * Up to $18K for teams * Top shippers, top loads * Reliable schedules & home time Who are we? We’re AM Carriers, and anyone in the business will tell you that we’re one of America’s hottest and fastest growing carriers. Now, thanks to our remarkable growth, we’re hiring drivers who have what it takes to step up to “the big leagues.” If you’ve been on the road for a few years now, you know that it takes a high level of skills and experience to pull Reefer & Dry Van. So if you’ve got the talent and the clean track record to prove it, hauling for AM Carriers could be your ticket to a higher income and a better future for you and your family. Why haul for AM Carriers? When you sign on to be a company driver for AM Carriers, you’ll not only be earning great pay, you’ll be joining a winning team. At our company, we only hire the “best of the best” – people who actually care about the quality of their work and the reliability of their performance. And that applies to everyone on our team, all the way from the experts in our dispatch and data center to the mechanics in our garage, and to the top-notch team of drivers they support. You see, we started A&M trucking in 2016 with just 2 trucks. We hit 18 in 2018, 74 in 2020, and we are now at 102 trucks and trailers. How did we grow so quickly? Well, we started by doing things the RIGHT WAY with the RIGHT PEOPLE – and we’ve never compromised on either. That’s why our clients – top companies like Amazon, JB Hunt, Walmart and others – continue to give us their best routes and their best loads. They know that we provide the most reliable and accurate service in the entire trucking community. They know that we provide CONSISTENTLY RELIABLE SERVICE with every load we haul. And they know that our TOP-NOTCH DISPATCH AND TRACKING SYSTEM will keep them updated on the status of every truckload – and every item IN that truckload. We provide real-time updates with every mile and every delivery, so they have accurate information to share across their system. Many other truck lines do not have that capability, and it’s the reason the “big guys” give us so much of their volume of freight. And being a “BIG DEAL” to a lot of “BIG DEAL” shippers REALLY DOES have its rewards: top pay, great routes and flexibility in the types of equipment and loads you pull. It also means that your paycheck will be direct-deposited like clockwork – even if we haven’t been paid by the shipper. Plus it means a flexible schedule that you can count on – and that’s very important when you’re raising a family and you want to be home for your son’s baseball games. If you’re the kind of driver who is in demand, you will know just how big an opportunity this really is. So if you like what you’re hearing, call us NOW. We only have 17 trailers left on our lot, and they’ll go FAST. So call us today and we’ll have you talk directly with one of our founders so you can get the inside track on how we operate. At AM Carriers we treat each other like equals and friends, and we will truly welcome you into our family if you’ve got what it takes. This is a top-of-the line opportunity for the very best Reefer and Dry Van haulers in the business. If that sounds like you, Fill out this short form now and claim your status as one of the ‘best of the best’ and join AM Carriers today! FB.ME Time to Make Some 𝗥𝗘𝗔𝗟 𝗠𝗼𝗻𝗲𝘆. Fill out this form Tap here to fill out the quick form Apply now

So if you’ve got the talent and the clean track record to prove it, hauling for AM Carriers could be your ticket to a higher income and a better future for you and your family. Why haul for AM Carriers? When you sign on to be a company driver for AM Carriers, you’ll not only be earning great pay, you’ll be joining a winning team. At our company, we only hire the “best of the best” – people who actually care about the quality of their work and the reliability of their performance. And that applies to everyone on our team, all the way from the experts in our dispatch and data center to the mechanics in our garage, and to the top-notch team of drivers they support. You see, we started A&M trucking in 2016 with just 2 trucks. We hit 18 in 2018, 74 in 2020, and we are now at 102 trucks and trailers. How did we grow so quickly? Well, we started by doing things the RIGHT WAY with the RIGHT PEOPLE – and we’ve never compromised on either. That’s why our clients – top companies like Amazon, JB Hunt, Walmart and others – continue to give us their best routes and their best loads. They know that we provide the most reliable and accurate service in the entire trucking community. They know that we provide CONSISTENTLY RELIABLE SERVICE with every load we haul. And they know that our TOP-NOTCH DISPATCH AND TRACKING SYSTEM will keep them updated on the status of every truckload – and every item IN that truckload. We provide real-time updates with every mile and every delivery, so they have accurate information to share across their system. Many other truck lines do not have that capability, and it’s the reason the “big guys” give us so much of their volume of freight. And being a “BIG DEAL” to a lot of “BIG DEAL” shippers REALLY DOES have its rewards: top pay, great routes and flexibility in the types of equipment and loads you pull. It also means that your paycheck will be direct-deposited like clockwork – even if we haven’t been paid by the shipper. Plus it means a flexible schedule that you can count on – and that’s very important when you’re raising a family and you want to be home for your son’s baseball games. If you’re the kind of driver who is in demand, you will know just how big an opportunity this really is. So if you like what you’re hearing, call us NOW. We only have 17 trailers left on our lot, and they’ll go FAST. So call us today and we’ll have you talk directly with one of our founders so you can get the inside track on how we operate. At AM Carriers we treat each other like equals and friends, and we will truly welcome you into our family if you’ve got what it takes. This is a top-of-the line opportunity for the very best Reefer and Dry Van haulers in the business.
